subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Cincinnati Reds placed infielder Jolbert Cabrera on the 15-day disabled list Saturday. Cabrera sustained a compound dislocation of his left index finger sliding into second base in Cincinnati’s 4-2 win over the Yankees on Friday night. He became the fourth Reds shortstop on the disabled list.
